name: a fickle light #10
description:
"People who plant trees do not usually consider artificial light as a stressor, but it can impact a tree’s health and may eventually lead to an overall decline. Future plantings should not only consider the tree’s soil and water requirements, but also how the nighttime light needs of a specific species. Like humans, trees need to 'sleep' as well."

From a series - a fickle light - that focuses on artificial light and its effect on urban fauna and flora.
